group_1.textRight: Hagumu...

group_1.textLeft: ...Maria...

group_1.textRight: Hagumu...you're crying...

group_1.textLeft: N-no...! I just got dust in my eyes...

group_1.textRight: ...It's alright.@You're allowed to cry if you want to.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...[chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.9][chara:103001:lipSynch_1][chara:103001:eyeClose_0][chara:103001:mouthOpen_1]ah...[chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:2.5][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]waaah[chara:103001:effect_shake][chara:103001:motion_0][chara:103001:eyeClose_1]...

group_1.textRight: There, there...@It's been tough, hasn't it...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I...I...[chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:103001:lipSynch_1][chara:103001:effect_shake]I'm just no good...
I really thought there was something...@something that even I could do...
But...I really am no good...@There's nothing good about me...

group_1.textRight: That's not true at all.
Hagumu, there are good qualities about you
that are yours and yours alone.
So you mustn't say things like that about yourself.

group_1.textLeft: But, I am...
Get one thing done, and forget about two.
Even when I think something went okay,@I just end up ruining it...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A06]YAAaaahhh!!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:3035A07][chara:6104:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]...?!
Anyone else could've done it,@it's not like I was needed...
Always, always...all I do is regret things...!
...Even becoming a Magical Girl...

group_1.textCenter: (Huh...?@Why is that person near the tracks...?)

group_1.textRight: Um...that's dangerous...
Um...! Excuse me!

group_1.textLeft: It's no use, Hagumu Azumi.@That person is being controlled by a Witch.
Unless you defeat the Witch, you won't be able@to help that person.

group_1.textRight: A s-stuffed animal?! And it's talking...?@...A Witch...?

group_1.textLeft: Witches are dangerous beings that spread@curses among humans.
And only those with potential, like you,@can defeat Witches.

group_1.textRight: Ah wha-wha-wuh...@What...what do you mean...?!
[chara:103001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€•?!
T-the train...!
Um! The train is coming...!

group_1.textLeft: Hagumu, make a contract with me and@become a Magical Girl!
If you become a Magical Girl and defeat the Witch,@you can save that person.

group_1.textRight: E-even if you say that, just what am I@supposed to do...?!

group_1.textLeft: Tell me your wish.
If I grant your wish, the contract will be complete.

group_1.textRight: M-my wish...?
(I have to help this person...)

group_1.textLeft: Hagumu! There's no time!

group_1.textRight: W-whaaat...?!@I-I don't really understand...
The Witch is...controlling her...?@Then, that Witch...the Witch... Oh!
Erase the Witch controlling this person...!

group_1.textLeft: I don't regret saving that woman...
But I keep thinking...@There must've been a better wish to make...
Every time something bad happens,@I think back to how
it was my one chance to save that person...@and to change myself, too...
It's always like this...every time...

group_1.textRight: You're already plenty lovely, just the way you are.
Everyone makes mistakes.
I know you've got so many good qualities@beyond that.

group_1.textLeft: Well...that's because you're a kind person, Maria.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: It's because you're so kind that you can say@things like that, Maria...
Other people are different...
Just because I'm a little clumsy and I get@flustered sometimes...
They make fun of me...and look down on me...
Geez...I really hate it...!
Ugh...[chara:103001:effect_shake]*sniff*...
I'm sorry...
I cried so much...and just ended up@being a burden...

group_1.textRight: I'd never think of you as a bother.
You've been through something really@painful, Hagumu...
It's okay to lean on someone when you're@hurting like that.

group_1.textLeft: ...Even though you've done so much for me...
...I won't be able to see you again...

group_1.textRight: ...Why not?

group_1.textLeft: I... After all...
...I can't become part of the Kamihama@Magia Union...
Because...[chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]@...I just...

group_1.textRight: Can't we still be friends even if we belong to@different groups?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: After all, we've been friends since before any of@that started, haven't we?
Let's have tea and a chat again sometime.
Would it be so wrong for us to spend our time@like high school girls?

group_1.textLeft: ...High school girls...
Is it really alright...?@...Even though I'm not joining...?

group_1.textRight: It's okay.
[chara:303601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]If you tell me that you want to spend more time@together with me, that's all I need.

group_1.textLeft: *Sniff*...@[wait:1.2][chara:103001:cheek_0][chara:103001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]Th-thank you so much...

group_1.textRight: Until next time then, Hagumu?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Until next time...

group_1.textCenter: What words could I have said...
...to properly convey to you,@"That's not true"...?
...I really failed, didn't I...?@I couldn't be there for you...
